Class TradingCardInventorySystemController

java.lang.Object
TradingCardInventorySystemController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener, DocumentListener
public class TradingCardInventorySystemController extends Object implements ActionListener, DocumentListener
Controller class for the Trading Card Inventory System. Coordinates interactions between the model and the view.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
      Handles all action events from the view components. Routes different actions to appropriate handler methods based on the action command.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      ae - the action event triggered by user interaction Supported action commands:
      • Menu navigation commands ("Return to Main Menu", "Exit", etc.)
      • Card operations ("Add Card", "SELL_CARD", "CONFIRM_ADD_CARD")
      • Binder operations ("Create a new Binder", "CREATE_BASIC_BINDER", etc.)
      • Deck operations ("Create a new Deck", "CREATE_NORMAL_DECK", etc.)
      • Collection operations ("Adjust Card Count", "Display Card", "Display Collection")
